Seal characters (1)

欻字的基本解释

欻
xū
忽然：“神山崔巍，欻从背见。”
迅速：“夫欻而生者，必欻而灭。”

欻
chuā
象声词，急促的声响：欻的一声，队伍立刻立定。

欻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》許勿切，入物，曉。］
亦作“歘1”。
(1)忽然。
(2)轻举貌。
(3)动貌。参见“欻欻”。
[②]［chuā］
亦作“歘2”。
象声词。

欻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　欻； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页568第16
【唐韻】許物切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】許勿切，?音䬍。【說文】有所吹起也。【元包經】?仡仡，趯欻欻。【傳曰】欻欻，動也。　又【玉篇】忽也。【張衡·西京賦】神山崔巍，欻從背見。【註】欻之言忽也。【左思·詠史詩】自非攀龍客，何爲欻來遊。　又奄欻，去來不定之意。【左思·吳都賦】慌罔奄欻。　又歇欻，幽邃貌。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】歇欻幽靄。　又欻吸，疾貌。一曰猶翕忽也。【江淹·雜擬詩】欻吸鵾雞鳴。通作歘。【杜甫詩】秋風歘吸吹南國。　又與惚通。【韓愈詩】指畫變怳欻。【註】茫昧貌。當作怳惚。借用欻字。

Basic explanation of words
欻
xū
Suddenly: "Shenshan Cui Wei, see you from the back."
Quickly: "Whoever is born to a husband will die."
欻
chuā
Onomatopoeia, rushing sound: With a sound, the team immediately stands up.
欻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guang Yun" Xu Wu cut, into things, Xiao. ]
Also known as "歘1".
(1) Suddenly.
(2) Look lightly.
(3) Dynamic appearance. See "欻欻".
[②] [chuā]
Also known as "歘2".
Onomatopoeia.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　欻; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 568 16
[Tang Yun] Xu Wuqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Xu Wuqie,? Yin 䬍. [Said the text] It's also blown up. 【Yuan Bao Jing】? 廡仡，趯欻欻. [Chuan Yue] Chuan, moving.　[Jade articles] Suddenly again. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] Shenshan Cui Wei, see you from the back. [Note] Suddenly the words of Chu. [Zuo Si·Song History Poem] Since I am not a dragon-climbing person, what is Chulaiyou.　You are dying again, it's going to come and go. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Panic and distressed.　Have a rest again, with a faint look. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】Xie Lu You Mi.　Suck again, look sick. One said, You Ji Su also. [Jiang Yan·Miscellaneous Poems] Sucking cock crowing. Tong Zuo She. [Poems of Du Fu] The autumn wind blows the southern country.　It is connected with Xuan again. [Han Yushi] refers to the change of painting. [Note] Vague appearance. Treat it as a trance. Borrow the word 欻.
